description:
Adds a scenario and events.

▼Scenario
Battle of Tong Gate

After the Battle of Chibi, Liu Bei focuses on suppressing Southern Jing province, while Cao Cao begins his move south by assassinating Ma Teng, with which he provokes Ma Chao to raise troops in search of revenge.

▼Events
The Murder of Ma Teng, The Letter with Blacked-out Writing, Liu Bei Enters Shu, Ma Chao the Wanderer, Ma Chao Surrenders to Liu Bei

As Ma Chao, the hero of the Battle of Tong Gate, you can enjoy the fierce battles of Cao Cao and the revenge-seeking Ma Chao and other famous scenes from the original novel.
Note: The events will also occur in scenarios other than Battle of Tong Gate.

Note: This product is included in the ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
name: Scenario [Battle of Tong Gate] & Event Set
